name: North Kinsman Mountain

trails_config.name: Lonesome Lake & Kinsman Ridge
trails_config.description: Passes the high-altitude Lonesome Lake and Hut. The summit ledge offers a staggering, vertical view of the Franconia Ridge across the notch.
trails_config.parking_info: Lafayette Place Campground, I-93, Franconia, NH

current_conditions.ai_summary: Experience the beauty of New Hampshire on North Kinsman Mountain. At 4293 feet, this summit commands impressive views of the surrounding wilderness.
risk_factors: Check local trail conditions before departing.
Start early to avoid afternoon storms.

generated_description:
The Experience

Standing at 4293 feet, North Kinsman Mountain is a standout peak in New Hampshire. Known for its rugged and challenging terrain, it offers a quintessential hiking experience.

The Challenge

Hikers often choose the **Lonesome Lake & Kinsman Ridge**, a **9.2 mile** route gaining significant elevation. As part of the **NH48 4000-Footers**, it draws peak-baggers from across the region.

Peak Bagging Logic

**Peak Bagging Opportunity:** Consider connecting this hike with **South Kinsman Mountain**, which is just 0.8 miles away. Linking these peaks is a popular way to maximize your day on the trail.
